Presuming no clichs in shipping I am very happy with the floor care this unit provides and I expect that I will see the same service on the furniture implements.  I can say that the professional and cordial support I received led me to say that Amazon's service has always been 5+ and now it appears that Shark vacuums has the same care and detail in the care of their clients.  Good to know a few companies still feel that customer service is the final detail in a satisfied customer.

item title: Eclipse Quick Release Woodworking Vise, Gray Cast Iron, 9" Size
review: Right out of the box, the release mechanism seemed a little too stiff, so I slacked it off.  This was not terribly difficult to do while I had the vise apart to clean off the shipping grease and attach it.  As a result of loosening the quick release lever spring, the mechanism can hang "mid thread" and only partially engage the screw at times.  Turning the screw then causes it to "snap" suddenly back into the threads.  A slight trade-off, but one I feel is worthwhile as the mechanism was too stiff for me to comfortably operate beforehand.  I applied white lithium grease to the rails and screw and go over the handle with scotch-brite and firearms CLP to keep the rust at bay, as I am handling it with sweaty hands.  The mechanism operates smoothly and solidly to its full extension without excessive play.  After using it for several months of planing and chiseling everything from mallet heads to 12ft long dimensional lumber, I can say it easily meets or exceeds my workholding needs every time.
